command: GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA process TO xspectre;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA process TO xspectre;
GRANT USAGE, SELECT ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA process TO xspectre;
GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA spectra TO xspectre;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA spectra TO xspectre;
GRANT USAGE, SELECT ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA spectra TO xspectre;
GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA sensor TO xspectre;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA sensor TO xspectre;
GRANT USAGE, SELECT ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA sensor TO xspectre;
GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA ancillary TO xspectre;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA ancillary TO xspectre;
GRANT USAGE, SELECT ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA ancillary TO xspectre;
